title: Swarm Mode Introduction for IT Pros
description: The voting app is a multi-container application often used for demo purposes during Docker meetups and conferences. It basically allow users to vote between two choices, the default being "cat" and "dog", but could be "space" or "tab", too, if you feel like it. This application is available on Github and updated very frequently when new features are developed.

meta.title: Swarm Mode Introduction for IT Pros
meta.description: Explore the fundamentals of Docker Swarm Mode and learn how to set up a high-availability cluster for your container-based applications.
meta.keywords: docker, swarm mode, container orchestration, high availability, scalability
